title: Thief Gold
notes: Menus work. Always crashes on game start

title: Thief Gold
notes: Menus are bugged, trying to start game crashes. Game used to work under old Wine (1.x) versions, but hasn't worked in any 3.x version I've used.

title: Thief Gold
notes:
Works fine WITH TFix 1.26, I installed it to the game's directory with Wine.
You can download TFix from here: http://www.ttlg.com/forums/showthread.php?t=134733 or here: https://www.moddb.com/mods/tfix/downloads/tfix-126

gpu: Intel Open Source Technology Center Mesa DRI Intel(R) Ivybridge Mobile x86/MMX/SSE2
notes: As others said, works after installing TFix. Before that, it crashed when clicking "New training"
title: Thief™ Gold

notes:
As mentioned, you need tfix.

This is what I did:

export STEAMPATH=/srv/steam  (You will probably need something else)
export WINEPREFIX=$STEAMPATH/steam/steamapps/compatdata/211600/pfx
export WINEPATH=$STEAMPATH/steam/steamapps/common/Proton 3.7/dist/bin/wine64
cd "$WINEPREFIX/drive_c/Program Files (x86)"
ln -s $STEAMPATH/steam/steamapps/common/thief_gold/ .
$WINEPATH ~/Downloads/TFix_1.26.exe (to apply TFIX)
title: Thief™ Gold
